TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComRegisterFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComRegisterFunctionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定當您登錄來自 COM 的所用組件 (Assembly) 時要呼叫的方法；這個方法可讓您在登錄程序期間執行使用者撰寫的程式碼。

span.span: Specifies the method to call when you register an assembly for use from COM; this enables the execution of user-written code during the registration process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至方法。You can apply this attribute to methods. 可讓您新增任意註冊程式碼，以配合 COM 用戶端的需求。 enables you to add arbitrary registration code to accommodate the requirements of COM clients. 例如，您可以更新使用註冊函式，從登錄命名空間。For example, you can update the registry using registration functions from the namespace. 如果您提供的註冊方法，您還必須套用取消登錄的方法，這會反轉註冊方法中完成的作業。If you provide a registration method, you must also apply to an unregistration method, which reverses the operations done in the registration method. Common language runtime 呼叫具有此屬性的方法，其包含的組件註冊時 （直接或間接） 與[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)或透過方法。The common language runtime calls the method with this attribute when its containing assembly is registered (directly or indirectly) with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)or through the method. 這個屬性只能用於具有下列特性的方法：This attribute can be applied only to methods that have the following characteristics: - 範圍： 任何 （公用、 私用和等等）。Scope: Any (public, private, and so on). - 類型：`static`。Type: `static`. - 參數： 接受單一參數或參數類型。Parameters: Accepts a single parameter or a parameter type. - 傳回型別： `void`。Return type: `void`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用和具有適當簽章的方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply and to methods with the appropriate signature. [!code-cpp[Classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComRegisterFunctionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
